name: 4th World Congress on Vision Science & Eye Surgery 2022
content: EYESURGERY-2022 an extensive range of critically important sessions from basic research to recent innovations. The theme: “Pathbreaking Innovations and New Possibilities in Vision Science & Eye Surgery” is intended for Eye Surgery experts at all levels and stages of their careers who wish to gain a better knowledge of what will drive and shape the market's future.Benefits for Conference: • 1\. Keynote certificate / speaker Certificate 2\. CPD certificate / CME certificate 3\. Best speaker / best young researcher award 4\. Journal Publication with ISSN number 5\. Separate Biography and research page in website. 6\. Conference Kit 7\. Lunch and breakfast.
